queryConfiguration.defaultPrefixes: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX coins-base: <http://www.coinsweb.nl/cbim-2.0.rdf#> PREFIX cbim: <http://www.coinsweb.nl/cbim-2.0.rdf#>

query.description: COINS 2.0 Lite profile check on predicate usage
query.resultFormat: The subject ${a} uses an unsupported predicate ${b} to object ${c}, check link to Google! for more info

query.description: COINS 2.0 Lite profile check on object usage
query.resultFormat: The subject ${a} has a predicate ${b} to an unsupported object ${c}

query.description: Entailment of restriction subclasses via the allvaluesfrom construct part 1
Entailment of restriction subclasses via the allvaluesfrom construct part 2
Entailment of restriction subclasses via the hasValue construct
Restriction subclassing for hasValue restrictions. dependency on list:member removed
UnionClass subtyping entailment. Removed list:member dependency
Default values entailment via the hasValue constraint

query.resultFormat: ${this} has ${aantal} properties of ${property}. The minimum is ${min},
${this} has ${aantal} properties of ${property}. Exactly ${min} is necessary.
${this} has ${aantal} properties of ${property}. The maximum is ${min}.
${this} has ${aantal} qualified properties of ${property} of type ${onClass}. ${min} values is necessary.
${this} has ${aantal} qualified properties of ${property} . the maximum is ${min}.
${this} has ${aantal} qualified properties of ${property} . the minimum is ${min}.

query.description: functional property as a restriction validation
query.resultFormat: ${this} has ${aantal} properties of ${property}. Only 1 is allowed (functional property).
${value} is of the type ${dat} which is not valid for ${prop} for individual ${a}. It should be a ${range}.
${value} is not a valid value for datatype property ${prop} for individual ${a}
${value} is not a valid value for object property ${prop} for individual ${a}
individual ${a} has a property ${prop} with value ${b}. ${a} is not of the correct type
individual ${a} has a property ${prop} with value ${b}. ${b} is not of the correct type
${value} is not set for object property ${prop} for individual ${a}
${a} is not correct for property ${prop}
${a} does not fulfill all UnionOf restrictions
${a} does not fulfill the Intersection restriction ${restriction}
instance ${x} is a member of ${c1} and of ${c2}. ${c1} and ${c2} are disjoint so instance ${x} cannot be a member of both classes
instance ${x} is a member of ${c1} and of ${c2}. ${c1} and ${c2} are disjoint so instance ${x} cannot be a member of both classes.
